name: Overnight Stocking!!
description:
Overnight Stocking is a fast-paced game about stocking shelves! But instead of putting them on the shelf you...feed them...to weird box cat things...huh.

They are hungry! Feed them! Before a timer runs out of course! Also as your running through the isles, you may be stopped by various minigames and or unknown cat demons who MAY or MAYYYYNOT....harm you...

We Want YOU! Stocking! Our! Shelves!

(In under 5 minutes...)

This is a really really short game, it's totally possible to beat it in under 5 minutes if you're lucky. That being said, this is the first videogame I've made since I was a kid. I've always had a passion for this kind of thing, so any feedback at all would be super super helpful! I want to get better at this!!

Thank you so much for reading this far if you did, and if you want to follow me you can either on this website or on my Twitter @BrightPrevail 

Hope to see you in the future! Happy stocking!
